trans-unit.source: about_Remote_FAQ
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_FAQ

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Remote FAQ
trans-unit.target: 關於遠端常見問題集

trans-unit.source: about_Remote_FAQ
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_FAQ

trans-unit.source: about_Remote_FAQ
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_FAQ

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Contains questions and answers about running remote commands in Windows PowerShell�.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關在 Windows PowerShell 中執行遠端命令問題和解答。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: When you work remotely, you type commands in Windows PowerShell on one computer (known as the "local computer"), but the commands run on another computer (known as the "remote computer").
trans-unit.target: 當您在遠端工作時，在 Windows PowerShell 中輸入命令 （又稱為 「 本機電腦 」），一部電腦上，但是 （又稱為 「 遠端電腦 」） 的另一部電腦上執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The experience of working remotely should be as much like working directly at the remote computer as possible.
trans-unit.target: 遠端工作的體驗應該像盡可能直接在遠端電腦上工作一樣多。

trans-unit.source: MUST BOTH COMPUTERS HAVE WINDOWS POWERSHELL INSTALLED?
trans-unit.target: 這兩部電腦必須安裝 WINDOWS POWERSHELL？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: To work remotely, the local and remote computers must have Windows PowerShell, the Microsoft .NET Framework, and the Web Services for Management (WS-Management) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 若要在遠端工作，在本機和遠端電腦必須有 Windows PowerShell、 Microsoft.NET Framework 和 Web 服務管理 (Ws-management) 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Any files and other resources that are needed to execute a particular command must be on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 任何檔案和其他資源所需執行特定命令必須是遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Computers running Windows PowerShell 3.0 and computers running Windows PowerShell 2.0 can connect to each other remotely and run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 執行 Windows PowerShell 3.0 的電腦和執行 Windows PowerShell 2.0 的電腦可以從遠端連線到彼此，並執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: However, some features, such as the ability to disconnect from a session and reconnect to it, work only when both computers are running Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些功能，能夠從工作階段中斷連線並重新連接到它，例如使用只有當兩台電腦正在執行 Windows PowerShell 3.0。

trans-unit.source: You must have permission to connect to the remote computer, permission to run Windows PowerShell, and permission to access data stores (such as files and folders), and the registry on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您必須連接到遠端電腦的權限、 執行 Windows PowerShell 的權限和存取資料存放區 （例如檔案和資料夾） 和遠端電腦上的登錄的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: HOW DOES REMOTING WORK?
trans-unit.target: 遠端處理如何運作？

trans-unit.source: When you submit a remote command, the command is transmitted across the network to the Windows PowerShell engine on the remote computer, and it runs in the Windows PowerShell client on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您提交遠端命令時，命令會在網路的遠端電腦上，Windows PowerShell 引擎來傳輸，並在遠端電腦上執行 Windows PowerShell 用戶端中。

trans-unit.source: The command results are sent back to the local computer and appear in the Windows PowerShell session on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令結果傳送回本機電腦，並出現在本機電腦上的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To transmit the commands and receive the output, Windows PowerShell uses the WS-Management protocol.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送命令和接收的輸出，Windows PowerShell 會使用 Ws-management 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: For information about the WS-Management protocol, see "WS-Management Protocol" in the MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) library at http:\/\/go.microsoft.com\/fwlink\/?LinkId\=144634.
trans-unit.target: Ws-management 通訊協定的相關資訊，請參閱 MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) 文件庫中的 「 WS 管理通訊協定 」，http:\/\/go.microsoft.com 通訊\/fwlink\/嗎？LinkId\=144634。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, remote sessions are stored on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，遠端工作階段會儲存在遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to disconnect from the session and reconnect from a different session or a different computer without interrupting the commands or losing state.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您從工作階段中斷連線，以及從不同的工作階段或在不同的電腦重新連線，而不需中斷之命令或失去狀態。

trans-unit.source: IS WINDOWS POWERSHELL REMOTING SECURE?
trans-unit.target: WINDOWS POWERSHELL 遠端功能是否安全？

trans-unit.source: When you connect to a remote computer, the system uses the user name and password credentials on the local computer or the credentials that you supply in the command to log you in to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您連線到遠端電腦時，系統會使用在本機電腦或您提供的命令，以記錄您在遠端電腦的認證的使用者名稱和密碼認證。

trans-unit.source: The credentials and the rest of the transmission are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 認證和傳輸的其餘部分都會加密。

trans-unit.source: To add additional protection, you can configure the remote computer to use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) instead of HTTP to listen for Windows Remote Management (WinRM) requests.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增額外的保護，您可以設定要接聽的 Windows 遠端管理 (WinRM) 要求使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 而不是 HTTP 的遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: Then, users can use the UseSSL parameters of the Invoke-Command, New-PSSession, and Enter-PSSession cmdlets when establishing a connection.
trans-unit.target: 然後，使用者在建立連線時，可以使用 UseSSL 參數叫用命令、 New-pssession 和 Enter-pssession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This option uses the more secure HTTPS channel instead of HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 此選項會使用更安全的 HTTPS 通道，而不是 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: DO ALL REMOTE COMMANDS REQUIRE WINDOWS POWERSHELL REMOTING?
trans-unit.target: 所有的遠端命令需要 WINDOWS POWERSHELL 遠端執行功能嗎？

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不可以。

trans-unit.source: Several cmdlets have a ComputerName parameter that lets you get objects from the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 數個 cmdlet 都有 ComputerName 參數，可讓您從遠端電腦取得物件。

trans-unit.source: These cmdlets do not use Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 這些 cmdlet 不會使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: So, you can use them on any computer that is running Windows PowerShell, even if the computer is not configured for Windows PowerShell remoting or if the computer does not meet the requirements for Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們正在執行 Windows PowerShell，即使電腦未設定 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，或如果電腦不符合 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能需求的任何電腦上。

trans-unit.source: These cmdlets include the following cmdlets:
trans-unit.target: 這些 cmdlet 包括下列 cmdlet:

trans-unit.source: To find all the cmdlets with a ComputerName parameter, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找所有的 cmdlet 具有 ComputerName 參數，請輸入︰

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the ComputerName parameter of a particular cmdlet requires Windows PowerShell remoting, see the parameter description.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷特定的指令程式的 ComputerName 參數是否需要 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，請參閱參數描述。

trans-unit.source: To display the parameter description, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示參數的描述，請輸入︰

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: For all other commands, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他的命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: HOW DO I RUN A COMMAND ON A REMOTE COMPUTER?
trans-unit.target: 如何在遠端電腦上執行命令？

trans-unit.source: To run a command on a remote computer, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在遠端電腦上執行命令，使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Enclose your command in braces ( {} ) to make it a script block.
trans-unit.target: 讓指令碼區塊的括號 （{}） 括住您的命令。

trans-unit.source: Use the ScriptBlock parameter of Invoke-Command to specify the command.
trans-unit.target: 用於叫用命令的 ScriptBlock 參數指定的命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command to specify a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Invoke-command 的 ComputerName 參數來指定遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can create a persistent connection to a remote computer (a session) and then use the Session parameter of Invoke-Command to run the command in the session.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以建立持續連線到遠端電腦 （工作階段），然後使用工作階段中執行命令的 [叫用命令的工作階段參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following commands run a Get-Process command remotely.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令 Get-process 命令從遠端執行。

trans-unit.source: To interrupt a remote command, type CTRL\+C.
trans-unit.target: 若要中斷遠端命令，輸入 CTRL\+c。

trans-unit.source: The interruption request is passed to the remote computer, where it terminates the remote command.
trans-unit.target: 中斷要求會傳遞到遠端電腦上，則會終止遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about remote commands, see about_Remote and the Help topics for the cmdlets that support remoting.
trans-unit.target: 如需遠端命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote 和支援遠端處理的 cmdlet 說明主題。

trans-unit.source: CAN I JUST "TELNET INTO" A REMOTE COMPUTER?
trans-unit.target: 我可以只 「 TELNET 至 「 遠端電腦？

trans-unit.source: You can use the Enter-PSSession cmdlet to start an interactive session with a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Enter-pssession cmdlet 啟動互動式工作階段的遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: At the Windows PowerShell prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 提示字元中，輸入︰

trans-unit.source: The command prompt changes to show that you are connected to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令提示字元中的變更，以顯示您已連接到遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: Now, the commands that you type run on the remote computer just as though you typed them directly on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 現在，您輸入的命令遠端電腦上執行就如同您直接在遠端電腦上輸入。

trans-unit.source: To end the interactive session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要結束互動式工作階段，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: An interactive session is a persistent session that uses the WS-Management protocol.
trans-unit.target: 互動式工作階段會使用 Ws-management 通訊協定的持續性工作階段。

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as using Telnet, but it provides a similar experience.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 Telnet，相同，但它提供類似的經驗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Enter-PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Enter-pssession。

trans-unit.source: CAN I CREATE A PERSISTENT CONNECTION?
trans-unit.target: 可以建立持續連線嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: You can run remote commands by specifying the name of the remote computer, its NetBIOS name, or its IP address.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定遠端電腦的名稱、 它的 NetBIOS 名稱或 IP 位址來執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can run remote commands by specifying a Windows PowerShell session (PSSession) that is connected to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以藉由指定連接到遠端電腦的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段 (PSSession) 執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: When you use the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command or Enter-PSSession, Windows PowerShell establishes a temporary connection.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Invoke-command 或 Enter-pssession 的 ComputerName 參數時，Windows PowerShell 會建立暫時連線。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell uses the connection to run only the current command, and then it closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 執行只有目前的命令，使用的連接，然後就會關閉連線。

trans-unit.source: This is a very efficient method for running a single command or several unrelated commands, even on many remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 這是非常有效率的方法來執行單一命令或數個不相關的命令，即使許多遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: When you use the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a PSSession, Windows PowerShell establishes a persistent connection for the PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 New-pssession cmdlet 建立 PSSession 時，Windows PowerShell 會建立持續連線的 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: Then, you can run multiple commands in the PSSession, including commands that share data.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行多個命令中的 PSSession，包括共用資料的命令。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a PSSession to run a series of related commands that share data.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您建立 PSSession 來執行一系列的共用資料的相關命令。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the temporary connection created by the ComputerName parameter is sufficient for most commands.
trans-unit.target: 否則，ComputerName 參數所建立的暫時連線就足以應付大部分的命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about sessions, see about_PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_PSSessions。

trans-unit.source: CAN I RUN COMMANDS ON MORE THAN ONE COMPUTER AT A TIME?
trans-unit.target: 我可以一次多部電腦中執行的命令嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: The ComputerName parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet accepts multiple computer names, and the Session parameter accepts multiple PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: Invoke-command cmdlet 的 ComputerName 參數接受多個電腦名稱，以及工作階段參數接受多個 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: When you run an Invoke-Command command, Windows PowerShell runs the commands on all of the specified computers or in all of the specified PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: 當您執行命令叫用命令時，Windows PowerShell 會在所有指定的電腦或在所有指定的 Pssession 上執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell can manage hundreds of concurrent remote connections.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 可以管理數百個同時遠端連線。

trans-unit.source: However, the number of remote commands that you can send might be limited by the resources of your computer and its capacity to establish and maintain multiple network connections.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以傳送的遠端命令的數目可能會受到您的電腦和要建立並維護多個網路連線能力的資源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example in the Invoke-Command Help topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱叫用命令的說明主題的範例。

trans-unit.source: WHERE ARE MY PROFILES?
trans-unit.target: 在哪裡？ 我的設定檔

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell profiles are not run automatically in remote sessions, so the commands that the profile adds are not present in the session.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 設定檔會自動執行遠端工作階段，因此設定檔新增的命令不會出現在工作階段。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the $profile automatic variable is not populated in remote sessions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在遠端工作階段不會填入 $profile 自動變數。

trans-unit.source: To run a profile in a session, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的工作階段中的設定檔，使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command runs the CurrentUserCurrentHost profile from the local computer in the session in $s.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令來執行 CurrentUserCurrentHost 設定檔從本機電腦的工作階段中 $s。

trans-unit.source: The following command runs the CurrentUserCurrentHost profile from the remote computer in the session in $s.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令來執行從遠端電腦的工作階段中 $s CurrentUserCurrentHost 設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Because the $profile variable is not populated, the command uses the explicit path to the profile.
trans-unit.target: 不會填入 $profile 變數，因為此命令會使用設定檔的明確路徑。

trans-unit.source: After running this command, the commands that the profile adds to the session are available in $s.
trans-unit.target: 執行此命令之後，該設定檔新增至工作階段的命令可用於 $s。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a startup script in a session configuration to run a profile in every remote session that uses the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用工作階段設定中的啟動指令碼，在使用工作階段設定每個遠端工作階段中執行設定檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell profiles, see about_Profiles.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Windows PowerShell 設定檔的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Profiles。

trans-unit.source: For more information about session configurations, see Register-PSSessionConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作階段設定的詳細資訊，請參閱 Register-pssessionconfiguration。

trans-unit.source: HOW DOES THROTTLING WORK ON REMOTE COMMANDS?
trans-unit.target: 遠端命令的節流的運作方式？

trans-unit.source: To help you manage the resources on your local computer, Windows PowerShell includes a per-command throttling feature that lets you limit the number of concurrent remote connections that are established for each command.
trans-unit.target: 為了協助您管理您的本機電腦上的資源，Windows PowerShell 會包含每個命令的節流功能，可讓您建立的每個命令的同時遠端連線數目限制。

trans-unit.source: The default is 32 concurrent connections, but you can use the ThrottleLimit parameters of the cmdlets to set a custom throttle limit for particular commands.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 32 個並行連線，但您可以使用 cmdlet 的 ThrottleLimit 參數來設定自訂的節流閥限制為特定的命令。

trans-unit.source: When you use the throttling feature, remember that it is applied to each command, not to the entire session or to the computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用節流功能時，請記住，適用於每個命令，不適用於整個工作階段或電腦。

trans-unit.source: If you are running commands concurrently in several sessions or PSSessions, the number of concurrent connections is the sum of the concurrent connections in all the sessions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您同時在數個工作階段或 Pssession 中執行命令，同時連線數目會是所有工作階段中的同時連線的總和。

trans-unit.source: To find cmdlets with a ThrottleLimit parameter, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找 cmdlet 搭配 ThrottleLimit 參數，請輸入︰

trans-unit.source: IS THE OUTPUT OF REMOTE COMMANDS DIFFERENT FROM LOCAL OUTPUT?
trans-unit.target: 遠端命令的輸出是本機輸出不同的？

trans-unit.source: When you use Windows PowerShell locally, you send and receive "live" .NET Framework objects; "live" objects are objects that are associated with actual programs or system components.
trans-unit.target: 當您在本機使用 Windows PowerShell 時，您傳送和接收 「 即時 」 的.NET Framework 物件。「 即時 」 物件是實際的程式或系統元件相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the methods or change the properties of live objects, the changes affect the actual program or component.
trans-unit.target: 當您叫用的方法，或變更使用中物件的屬性時，這些變更會影響實際的程式或元件。

trans-unit.source: And, when the properties of a program or component change, the properties of the object that represent them also change.
trans-unit.target: 而且，當程式或元件的屬性變更時，代表物件屬性也改變。

trans-unit.source: However, because most live objects cannot be transmitted over the network, Windows PowerShell "serializes" most of the objects sent in remote commands, that is, it converts each object into a series of XML (Constraint Language in XML [CLiXML]) data elements for transmission.
trans-unit.target: 不過，大部分的即時物件無法透過網路傳輸，因為 Windows PowerShell 的 「 序列化 」 大部分的遠端命令中傳送的物件，也就是將每個物件轉換為一系列的 XML （XML [CLiXML] 中的條件約束語言） 進行傳輸的資料元素。

trans-unit.source: When Windows PowerShell receives a serialized object, it converts the XML into a deserialized object type.
trans-unit.target: 當 Windows PowerShell 收到序列化的物件時，它會將 XML 轉換成已還原序列化的物件型別中。

trans-unit.source: The deserialized object is an accurate record of the properties of the program or component at a previous time, but it is no longer "live", that is, it is no longer directly associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化的物件屬性的程式或元件的精確記錄在先前的時間，但是就無法再 「 即時 」，也就是不再直接與元件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: And, the methods are removed because they are no longer effective.
trans-unit.target: 而且方法會被移除，因為它們不再有效。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you can use deserialized objects just as you would use live objects, but you must be aware of their limitations.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您可以使用已還原序列化的物件，就像您會使用現存的物件，但您必須注意其限制。

trans-unit.source: Also, the objects that are returned by the Invoke-Command cmdlet have additional properties that help you to determine the origin of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此外，Invoke-command cmdlet 所傳回的物件會有幫助您判斷命令來源的其他屬性。

trans-unit.source: Some object types, such as DirectoryInfo objects and GUIDs, are converted back into live objects when they are received.
trans-unit.target: 收到時，某些物件類型，例如 DirectoryInfo 物件和 Guid，會轉換回物件。

trans-unit.source: These objects do not need any special handling or formatting.
trans-unit.target: 這些物件不需要任何特殊處理，或格式化。

trans-unit.source: For information about interpreting and formatting remote output, see about_Remote_Output.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何解讀報告以及設定遠端輸出格式資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Output。

trans-unit.source: CAN I RUN BACKGROUND JOBS REMOTELY?
trans-unit.target: 我可以從遠端執行背景工作嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A Windows PowerShell background job is a Windows PowerShell command that runs asynchronously without interacting with the session.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 背景工作是以非同步方式執行時不會與工作階段互動的 Windows PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: When you start a background job, the command prompt returns immediately, and you can continue to work in the session while the job runs even if it runs for an extended period of time.
trans-unit.target: 當您啟動背景工作時，命令提示字元會立即傳回，您可以繼續在工作執行，即使它的長時間執行時，工作階段中。

trans-unit.source: You can start a background job even while other commands are running because background jobs always run asynchronously in a temporary session.
trans-unit.target: 因為背景工作一律以非同步方式執行的暫時工作階段中執行其他命令時，您可以啟動背景工作。

trans-unit.source: You can run background jobs on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在本機或遠端電腦上執行背景工作。

trans-unit.source: By default, a background job runs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，本機電腦上執行背景工作。

trans-unit.source: However, you can use the AsJob parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run any remote command as a background job.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 的 AsJob 參數，任何遠端命令當作背景工作來執行。

trans-unit.source: And, you can use Invoke-Command to run a Start-Job command remotely.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Invoke-command 從遠端執行 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about background jobs in Windows PowerShell , see about_Jobs and about_Remote_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Windows PowerShell 中的背景工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Jobs 和 about_Remote_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: CAN I RUN WINDOWS PROGRAMS ON A REMOTE COMPUTER?
trans-unit.target: 可以在遠端電腦上執行 WINDOWS 程式嗎？

trans-unit.source: You can use Windows PowerShell remote commands to run Windows-based programs on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端命令在遠端電腦上執行 Windows 的程式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can run Shutdown.exe or Ipconfig on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在遠端電腦上執行 Shutdown.exe 或 Ipconfig。

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot use Windows PowerShell commands to open the user interface for any program on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您無法使用 Windows PowerShell 命令來開啟遠端電腦上的任何程式的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: When you start a Windows program on a remote computer, the command is not completed, and the Windows PowerShell command prompt does not return, until the program is finished or until you press CTRL\+C to interrupt the command.
trans-unit.target: 當您在遠端電腦上啟動 Windows 程式時，命令不會完成，而 Windows PowerShell 命令提示字元不會傳回，直到程式完成或直到您按下 CTRL\+C 來中斷命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you run the IpConfig program on a remote computer, the command prompt does not return until IpConfig is completed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您在遠端電腦上執行 IpConfig 程式，命令提示字元不會傳回之前完成 IpConfig。

trans-unit.source: If you use remote commands to start a program that has a user interface, the program process starts, but the user interface does not appear.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用遠端命令啟動程式具有使用者介面，處理序啟動程式，但是使用者介面不會出現。

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell command is not completed, and the command prompt does not return until you stop the program process or until you press CTRL\+C, which interrupts the command and stops the process.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 命令不會完成，且直到您停止程式處理程序或按住 ctrl 鍵不會傳回命令提示字元\+C，命令會中斷並停止處理程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use a Windows PowerShell command to run Notepad on a remote computer, the Notepad process starts on the remote computer, but the Notepad user interface does not appear.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您使用 Windows PowerShell 命令在遠端電腦上執行 [記事本]，在 「 記事本 」 處理序啟動的遠端電腦上，但不會出現在 [記事本] 使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: To interrupt the command and restore the command prompt, press CTRL\+C.
trans-unit.target: 若要中斷命令，並還原命令提示字元中，按住 ctrl 鍵\+c。

trans-unit.source: CAN I LIMIT THE COMMANDS THAT USERS CAN RUN REMOTELY ON MY COMPUTER?
trans-unit.target: 我可以限制使用者可以從遠端執行我的電腦的命令嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: Every remote session must use one of the session configurations on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 每個遠端工作階段必須使用其中一個工作階段設定的遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: You can manage the session configurations on your computer (and the permissions to those session configurations) to determine who can run commands remotely on your computer and which commands they can run.
trans-unit.target: 您可以管理的工作階段設定您的電腦 （以及這些工作階段設定的權限） 來決定誰可以執行命令從遠端電腦和哪些命令可以執行。

trans-unit.source: A session configuration configures the environment for the session.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段設定會將環境設定工作階段。

trans-unit.source: You can define the configuration by using an assembly that implements a new configuration class or by using a script that runs in the session.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用實作新的設定類別的組件，或使用工作階段中執行的指令碼來定義的組態。

trans-unit.source: The configuration can determine the commands that are available in the session.
trans-unit.target: 設定可以決定工作階段中可用的命令。

trans-unit.source: And, the configuration can include settings that protect the computer, such as settings that limit the amount of data that the session can receive remotely in a single object or command.
trans-unit.target: 並設定可以包含的設定來保護電腦，例如限制的工作階段中的單一物件或命令可以遠端接收的資料量的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a security descriptor that determines the permissions that are required to use the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定決定要使用組態所需的權限的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The Enable-PSRemoting cmdlet creates the default session configurations on your computer: Microsoft.PowerShell, Microsoft.PowerShell.Workflow, and Microsoft.PowerShell32 (64-bit operating systems only).
trans-unit.target: Enable-psremoting 指令程式會建立預設工作階段設定您的電腦上︰ Microsoft.PowerShell、 Microsoft.PowerShell.Workflow 和 Microsoft.PowerShell32 （僅限 64 位元作業系統）。

trans-unit.source: Enable-PSRemoting sets the security descriptor for the configuration to allow only members of the Administrators group on your computer to use them.
trans-unit.target: Enable-psremoting 設定以允許只有系統管理員群組的成員來使用這些電腦上設定的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: You can use the session configuration cmdlets to edit the default session configurations, to create new session configurations, and to change the security descriptors of all the session configurations.
trans-unit.target: 若要編輯的預設工作階段設定，建立新的工作階段設定，並變更所有工作階段設定的安全性描述元，您可以使用工作階段設定指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, the New-SessionConfigurationFile cmdlet lets you create custom session configurations by using a text file.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，新增 SessionConfigurationFile 指令程式可讓您建立自訂工作階段設定使用的文字檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file includes options for setting the language mode and for specifying the cmdlets and modules that are available in sessions that use the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此檔案包含與指定的 cmdlet 與使用工作階段設定的工作階段中可用的模組之設定的語言模式選項。

trans-unit.source: When users use the Invoke-Command, New-PSSession, or Enter-PSSession cmdlets, they can use the ConfigurationName parameter to indicate the session configuration that is used for the session.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者使用 Invoke-command、 New-pssession 或 Enter-pssession cmdlet 時，它們可以使用 ConfigurationName 參數來指出用於工作階段的工作階段設定。

trans-unit.source: And, they can change the default configuration that their sessions use by changing the value of the $PSSessionConfigurationName preference variable in the session.
trans-unit.target: 以及，他們可以變更其工作階段使用 $PSSessionConfigurationName 喜好設定變數的值變更工作階段中的預設設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about session configurations, see the Help for the session configuration cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作階段設定的詳細資訊，請參閱工作階段設定 cmdlet 的說明。

trans-unit.source: To find the session configuration cmdlets, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找工作階段設定指令程式，請輸入︰

trans-unit.source: WHAT ARE FAN-IN AND FAN OUT CONFIGURATIONS?
trans-unit.target: 什麼是收合傳送和展開傳送組態？

trans-unit.source: The most common Windows PowerShell remoting scenario involving multiple computers is the one-to-many configuration, in which one local computer (the administrator's computer) runs Windows PowerShell commands on numerous remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的 Windows PowerShell 遠端處理案例牽涉到多部電腦是一對多的設定，在其中一部本機電腦 （系統管理員的電腦），請執行許多遠端電腦的 Windows PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: This is known as the "fan-out" scenario.
trans-unit.target: 這就是所謂的 「 展開 」 案例。

trans-unit.source: However, in some enterprises, the configuration is many-to-one, where many client computers connect to a single remote computer that is running Windows PowerShell, such as a file server or a kiosk.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在某些企業中，組態是多對一其中許多用戶端電腦連接到單一遠端電腦執行 Windows PowerShell 中，例如檔案伺服器或資訊站。

trans-unit.source: This is known as the "fan-in" configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這就是所謂的 「 收合傳送 」 設定。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell remoting supports both fan-out and fan-in configurations.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 遠端處理支援展開和收合傳送設定。

trans-unit.source: For the fan-out configuration, Windows PowerShell uses the Web Services for Management (WS-Management) protocol and the WinRM service that supports the Microsoft implementation of WS-Management.
trans-unit.target: 展開傳送設定時，Windows PowerShell 會使用 Web 服務管理 (Ws-management) 通訊協定與支援 WS 管理的 Microsoft 實作的 WinRM 服務。

trans-unit.source: When a local computer connects to a remote computer, WS-Management establishes a connection and uses a plug-in for Windows PowerShell to start the Windows PowerShell host process (Wsmprovhost.exe) on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 當本機電腦連線到遠端電腦時，Ws-management 會建立連接，並在遠端電腦上啟動 Windows PowerShell 主機處理序 (Wsmprovhost.exe) 會使用 Windows PowerShell 的外掛程式。

trans-unit.source: The user can specify an alternate port, an alternate session configuration, and other features to customize the remote connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以指定替代的連接埠、 替代工作階段設定，以及其他功能自訂遠端連線。

trans-unit.source: To support the "fan-in" configuration, Windows PowerShell uses Internet Information Services (IIS) to host WS-Management, to load the Windows PowerShell plug-in, and to start Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援 「 收合傳送 」 設定，Windows PowerShell 使用網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 主機 WS 管理載入外掛程式，Windows PowerShell 並啟動 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, instead of starting each Windows PowerShell session in a separate process, all Windows PowerShell sessions run in the same host process.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，而不是個別的處理序中啟動每個 Windows PowerShell 工作階段中所有的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段執行相同的主機處理序中。

trans-unit.source: IIS hosting and fan-in remote management is not supported in Windows XP or in Windows Server 2003.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows XP 或 Windows Server 2003 中，不支援 IIS 裝載，而且收合傳送遠端管理。

trans-unit.source: In a fan-in configuration, the user can specify a connection URI and an HTTP endpoint, including the transport, computer name, port, and application name.
trans-unit.target: 在收合傳送組態中，使用者可以指定連線 URI 和 HTTP 端點，包括傳輸、 電腦名稱、 連接埠，以及應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: IIS forwards all the requests with a specified application name to the application.
trans-unit.target: IIS 會轉送至應用程式指定的應用程式名稱的所有要求。

trans-unit.source: The default is WS-Management, which can host Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 Ws-management，它可以裝載 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify an authentication mechanism and prohibit or allow redirection from HTTP and HTTPS endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定一種驗證機制和禁止或允許從 HTTP 和 HTTPS 端點重新導向。

trans-unit.source: CAN I TEST REMOTING ON A SINGLE COMPUTER \(NOT IN A DOMAIN\)?
trans-unit.target: 我可以測試在單一電腦上的遠端處理 \(不在網域中\)嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell remoting is available even when the local computer is not in a domain.
trans-unit.target: 即使在本機電腦不在網域中使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use the remoting features to connect to sessions and to create sessions on the same computer.
trans-unit.target: 連線到工作階段，並在同一部電腦上建立工作階段，您可以使用遠端處理功能。

trans-unit.source: The features work the same as they do when you connect to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 當您連接到遠端電腦一樣的功能的運作相同。

trans-unit.source: To run remote commands on a computer in a workgroup, change the following Windows settings on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要在工作群組電腦上執行遠端命令，變更電腦上的下列 Windows 設定。

trans-unit.source: Caution: These settings affect all users on the system and they can make the system more vulnerable to a malicious attack.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 這些設定會影響系統上的所有使用者，他們可以讓系統更容易受到惡意攻擊。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when making these changes.
trans-unit.target: 進行這些變更時，請務必小心。

trans-unit.source: -- Windows XP with SP2:
trans-unit.target: -Windows XP sp2:

trans-unit.source: Use Local Security Settings (Secpol.msc) to change the setting of the "Network Access: Sharing and security model for local accounts" policy in Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options to "Classic".
trans-unit.target: 使用本機安全性設定 (Secpol.msc) 來變更此設定的 「 網路存取︰ 共用和安全性模式用於本機帳戶 」 安全性 \ 原則 \ 安全性選項，以 「 傳統 」 中的原則。

trans-unit.source: -- Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8:
trans-unit.target: -Windows Vista、 Windows 7、 Windows 8:

trans-unit.source: Create the following registry entry, and then set its value to 1: LocalAccountTokenFilterPolicy in HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System
trans-unit.target: 建立下列登錄項目，然後將其值為 1︰ 在 HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System LocalAccountTokenFilterPolicy

trans-unit.source: You can use the following Windows PowerShell command to add this entry:
trans-unit.target: 若要將此項目，您可以使用下列 Windows PowerShell 命令︰

trans-unit.source: New-ItemProperty ` –Path HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System ` –Name LocalAccountTokenFilterPolicy –propertyType DWord –Value 1
trans-unit.target: New-itemproperty ` –Path HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System ` – 名稱 LocalAccountTokenFilterPolicy – propertyType DWord – 值 1

trans-unit.source: -- Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2:
trans-unit.target: -Windows Server 2003、 Windows Server 2008、 Windows Server 2012、 Windows Server 2012 R2:

trans-unit.source: No changes are needed because the default setting of the "Network Access: Sharing and security model for local accounts" policy is "Classic".
trans-unit.target: 因為需要進行任何變更預設的 「 網路存取︰ 共用和安全性模式用於本機帳戶 」 的原則是 「 傳統 」。

trans-unit.source: Verify the setting in case it has changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已變更，請確認設定。

trans-unit.source: CAN I RUN REMOTE COMMANDS ON A COMPUTER IN ANOTHER DOMAIN?
trans-unit.target: 可以在另一個網域的電腦上執行遠端命令嗎？

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the commands run without error, although you might need to use the Credential parameter of the Invoke-Command, New-PSSession, or Enter-PSSession cmdlets to provide the credentials of a member of the Administrators group on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，執行的命令不會發生錯誤，雖然您可能需要使用的認證參數叫用命令、 New-pssession 或 Enter-pssession cmdlet 在遠端電腦上提供的系統管理員群組成員的認證。

trans-unit.source: This is sometimes required even when the current user is a member of the Administrators group on the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 這是有時需要時，即使目前的使用者在本機和遠端電腦上的 Administrators 群組的成員。

trans-unit.source: However, if the remote computer is not in a domain that the local computer trusts, the remote computer might not be able to authenticate the user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果遠端電腦不在本機電腦信任的網域中，遠端電腦可能無法驗證使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: To enable authentication, use the following command to add the remote computer to the list of trusted hosts for the local computer in WinRM.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用驗證，請使用下列命令將遠端電腦新增至本機電腦在 WinRM 的受信任主機清單。

trans-unit.source: Type the command at the Windows PowerShell prompt.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 提示字元中輸入命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, to add the Server01 computer to the list of trusted hosts on the local computer, type the following command at the Windows PowerShell prompt:
trans-unit.target: 比方說，若要在本機電腦上的受信任主機清單中加入 Server01 電腦，請在 Windows PowerShell 提示字元輸入下列命令︰

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
